name: How To Survive with Danielle & Kristine

episodes.title: How To Survive a Cult & Family Secrets With Julie Dixon Jackson
episodes.description: This week Danielle and Kristine learn how to survive Cults and Cut Off Gene's own Julie Dixon Jackson is here to discuss digging up some family secrets as she searches for her birth parents! Here is an excellent piece of writing in Oprah Daily, by Samantha Vicenty (thank you Samantha) to help spot the warning signs of a cult. Read Hassan's full BITE model here . New Yorker piece- What Makes a Cult a Cult? NYT piece- How to Get Someone Out Of A Cult The Fellowship of Friends Cult The podcast Revelations And thank you to Feedspot for naming How to Survive with Danielle & Kristine one of the Best Comedy Podcasts of 2022!!!
